doc.sitename: EIKE - Europäisches Institut für Klima & Energie
doc.title: Registration Fees – 13th International Conference on Climate and Energy
doc.author: Michael Poost
doc.excerpt: Private Individuals Company/ Corporate Day Pass (Friday or Saturday) The price includes all lunch and coffee breaks and a conference bag with a book. 9

row.cell: Limited number of discounted tickets for pupils, students, trainees, part-time volunteers (with proof).

main.p: The price includes all lunch and coffee breaks and a conference bag with a book.
The price includes all lunch and coffee breaks and a conference bag with a book.
The price includes: Two lunches, all coffee breaks, dinner and conference bag with book.
Coffee breaks listed in the program are included in the conference price.
